src: ທ່ານກ່າວຕື່ມວ່າ ດຽວນີ້ ພວກເຮົາມີໜູທີ່ມີອາຍຸ 4 ເດືອນທີ່ບໍ່ເປັນພະຍາດເບົາຫວານ ຊຶ່ງເຄີຍເປັນພະຍາດເບົາຫວານ.
mt: 4-month-old baby has died, not a premature baby.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: ທ່ານ ດຣ. ອີຮູດ ເອີຣ໌ (Dr. Ehud Ur) ສາດສະດາຈານດ້ານການແພດຂອງມະຫາວິທະຍາໄລ ດາຮາວຊີ່ (Dalhousie University) ໃນເມືອງ ແຮລີແຟັກ (Halifax), ລັດ ໂນວາ ສະກ໊ອດເທຍ (Nova Scotia) ແລະ ປະທານໜ່ວຍງານການແພດ ແລະ ວິທະຍາສາດຂອງສະມາຄົມພະຍາດເບົາຫວານຂອງປະເທດການາດາ ເຕືອນວ່າການວິໄຈແມ່ນຍັງຄົງຢູ່ໃນໄລຍະຕົ້ນໆ.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, a Dalhousie University professor of mechanical engineering in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and president of the Canadian Society for Mechanical Engineering, said the research is still in its early stages.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: ເຊັ່ນດຽວກັບຜູ້ຊ່ຽວຊານຄົນອື່ນໆ, ລາວມີຄວາມສົງໄສວ່າໂລກເບົາຫວານສາມາດຮັກສາໄດ້ບໍ? ໂດຍສັງເກດວ່າການຄົ້ນພົບເຫຼົ່ານີ້ບໍ່ມີຄວາມກ່ຽວຂ້ອງກັບຄົນທີ່ເປັນໂລກເບົາຫວານປະເພດ 1 ເລີຍ.
mt: Like many others, Laos has wondered if the Zika virus can be transmitted sexually. The CDC says this report does not indicate sexual transmission.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: ໃນວັນຈັນ, Sara Danius ເລຂາທິການຖາວອນຂອງຄະນະກຳມະການໂນເບວສາຂາວັນນະຄະດີ ທີ່ສະຖາບັນສະວີເດັນ ໄດ້ປະກາດຢ່າງເປັນທາງການໃນລະຫວ່າງລາຍການວິທະຍຸທາງ Sveriges Radio ໃນປະເທດສະວີເດັນວ່າຄະນະກຳມະການບໍ່ສາມາດຕິດຕໍ່ Bob Dylan ໂດຍກົງກ່ຽວກັບການຊະນະລາງວັນໂນເບວສາຂາວັນນະຄະດີປະຈຳປີ 2016ໄດ້, ຈຶ່ງໄດ້ລະຖິ້ມຄວາມພະຍາຍາມທີ່ຈະຕິດຕໍ່ຫາລາວ.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, the permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy, which awards the Nobel Prize in Literature, announced in a press conference at the Swedish Radio in Sweden that the Nobel Committee for Literature 2016, which had been unable to reach Bob Dylan, had decided to award the prize to him, which had caused great excitement among the Swedes.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius ກ່າວວ່າ “ດຽວນີ້ພວກເຮົາບໍ່ໄດ້ເຮັດຫຍັງເລີຍ. ຂ້ອຍໄດ້ໂທ ແລະ ສົ່ງອີເມວຫາຜູ້ຮ່ວມງານທີ່ໃກ້ຊິດທີ່ສຸດຂອງລາວ ແລະ ໄດ້ຮັບຄຳຕອບທີ່ເປັນມິດຫຼາຍ. ສຳລັບຕອນນີ້ມັນກໍພຽງພໍແລ້ວ.”
mt: "We're not going to let this go. I've emailed the top guy at the Lao government and got a lot of pushback. For now, it's just going to have to sit."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: ກ່ອນໜ້ານີ້ ທ່ານ ເຈມມີ່ ຊີມີນັອບ (Jamie Siminoff) ປະທານກຳມະການບໍລິຫານຂອງ ຣິງ (Ring) ໄດ້ກ່າວວ່າບໍລິສັດ ໄດ້ເລີ່ມຕົ້ນ ເມື່ອສຽງກະດິງຂອງລາວບໍ່ດັງພໍໃຫ້ໄດ້ຍິນມາຈາກຮ້ານຂອງລາວ ໃນບ່ອນຈອດລົດຂອງລາວ.
mt: Before this, Ring CEO Jamie Siminoff said the company had stopped shipping from its warehouse in the U.S. when the company's orders started to fall.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: ລາວເວົ້າວ່າ ລາວໄດ້ສ້າງກະດິ່ງປະຕູທີ່ໃຊ້ວາຍຟາຍ (WiFi).
mt: Laos has built a network of WiFi hotspots.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff ກ່າວວ່າຍອດຂາຍໄດ້ເພີ່ມຂຶ້ນຫຼັງຈາກການປະກົດຕົວໃນປີ 2013 ໃນຕອນ Shark Tank ຂອງລາວ ເຊິ່ງຄະນະລາຍການດັ່ງກ່າວໄດ້ປະຕິເສດການສະໜັບສະໜູນເງິນທຶນໃນການເລີ່ມຕົ້ນທຸລະກິດ.
mt: Siminoff said the company had increased sales after appearing on the 2013 season of Shark Tank, which the network said had generated $55 million in sales for the entrepreneurs who appeared on the show.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: ໃນທ້າຍປີ 2017, Siminoff ໄດ້ໄປປາກົດຕົວໃນຊ່ອງໂທລະພາບການຄ້າ QVC.
mt: 2017, Siminoff was arrested for fraud in a QVC infomercial.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: ຣີງ (Ring) ຍັງໄດ້ຕັດສິນຄະດີຄວາມກັບບໍລິສັດຄວາມປອດໄພທີ່ເປັນຄູ່ແຂ່ງ, ຊຶ່ງແມ່ນບໍລິສັດ ADT Corporation.
mt: Ring (Ring) has filed a lawsuit against ADT Corporation, a security company.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: ເຖິງແມ່ນວ່າຈະມີວັກຊີນຈາກການທົດລອງຊະນິດໜຶ່ງທີ່ສາມາດຫຼຸດຜ່ອນການຕາຍຈາກອີໂບລາໄດ້ແຕ່ມາຮອດປັດຈຸບັນ, ບໍ່ມີຢາຊະນິດໃດທີ່ສະແດງໃຫ້ເຫັນຢ່າງຈະແຈ້ງວ່າເໝາະສົມກັບການຮັກສາການຕິດເຊື້ອທີ່ມີຢູ່.
mt: It is believed that there will be a vaccine from a product that can stop death from Ebola since the 1970s, but there is no product that shows that it can be used.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: ການປະສົມຢາຕ້ານເຊື້ອຊະນິດໜຶ່ງທີ່ຊື່ວ່າ ZMapp, ໃນເບື້ອງຕົ້ນໄດ້ສະແດງໃຫ້ເຫັນປະສິດທິພາບໃນການທົດລອງ ແຕ່ຈາກການສຶກສາຢ່າງເປັນທາງການລະບຸວ່າມັນມີຜົນປະໂຫຍດຫນ້ອຍກວ່າພະຍາຍາມການປ້ອງກັນການເສຍຊີວິດ.
mt: The trial of one drug called ZMapp, while still in the early stages, has shown promising results in treating Ebola, according to preliminary findings.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: ໃນການທົດລອງໃຊ້ PALM, ZMapp ໄດ້ເຮັດໜ້າທີ່ໃນການຄວບຄຸມ ເຊິ່ງໝາຍຄວາມວ່ານັກວິທະຍາສາດໄດ້ໃຊ້ມັນເປັນພື້ນຖານ ແລະ ປຽບທຽບການປິ່ນປົວອື່ນໆອີກສາມຢ່າງ.
mt: During testing of the PALM, ZMapp was found to be safe and well tolerated by the researchers, which means that it is a drug and not a vaccine.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: ສະຫະພັນກິລາຢິມນາສຕິກຂອງສະຫະລັດອາເມລິກາສະໜັບສະໜູນຈົດໝາຍຂອງຄະນະກຳມະການໂອລິມປິກສະຫະລັດອາເມລິກາ ແລະ ຍອມຮັບຄວາມຕ້ອງການທີ່ແນ່ນອນຂອງຄອບຄົວໂອລິມປິກເພື່ອສົ່ງເສີມສະພາບແວດລ້ອມທີ່ປອດໄພໃຫ້ແກ່ນັກກິລາຂອງພວກເຮົາທຸກຄົນ.
mt: The United States Olympic Committee and the United States Anti-Doping Agency have agreed to a new anti-doping policy that will apply to all U.S. athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: ພວກເຮົາເຫັນດີກັບຄຳຖະແຫຼງຂອງ USOC ວ່າຜົນປະໂຫຍດຂອງບັນດານັກກິລາ ແລະ ສະໂມສອນຂອງພວກເຮົາ ແລະ ກິລາຂອງພວກເຂົາເຈົ້າອາດຈະໄດ້ຮັບການບໍລິການທີ່ດີກວ່າເກົ່າໂດຍການກ້າວໄປຂ້າງໜ້າພ້ອມກັບການປ່ຽນແປງທີ່ມີຄວາມໝາຍພາຍໃນອົງກອນຂອງພວກເຮົາຫຼາຍກ່ວາການຮັບຮອງ.
mt: They heard the USOC's message that the team's performance and the support of the team and the support of the team's fans will receive better than the previous one.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: ສະມາຄົມກິລາ ຢິມນາສ໌ຕິກ ຂອງສະຫະລັດອາເມລິກາ (USA Gymnastics) ສະໜັບສະໜູນ ການສືບສວນທີ່ເປັນເອກະລາດ ຊຶ່ງອາດສ່ອງແສງໃຫ້ເຫັນເຖິງການລ່ວງລະເມີດສັດສ່ວນຕ່າງໆ ທີ່ອະທິບາຍຢ່າງກ້າຫານໂດຍຜູ້ລອດມາຈາກກຳມືຂອງ ແລຣີ ນາຊາ (Larry Nassar) ທີ່ບໍ່ໄດ້ຮັບການຄົ້ນພົບມາດົນແລ້ວ ແລະ ລົງມືເຮັດການປ່ຽນແປງທີ່ຈຳເປັນ ແລະ ເໝາະສົມ.
mt: USA Gymnastics has agreed to pay $215 million to settle claims that it failed to protect athletes from sexual abuse by former team doctor Larry Nassar, who was not properly vetted and whose conduct was not properly reported and investigated, and whose employment was not properly terminated.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: ສະຫະພັນກິລາຢິມນາສຕິກຂອງສະຫະລັດອາເມລິກາ ແລະ USOC ມີເປົ້າໝາຍດຽວກັນກໍຄື - ການເຮັດໃຫ້ກິລາກາຍຍະກຳ ແລະ ອື່ນໆ, ປອດໄພທີ່ສຸດເທົ່າທີ່ເປັນໄປໄດ້ສຳລັບນັກກິລາທີ່ຈະຕາມຄວາມຝັນຂອງພວກເຂົາໃນສະພາບແວດລ້ອມທີ່ປອດໄພ, ເຊື່ອຖືໄດ້ ແລະ ມີພະລັງ.
mt: The USOC and USA Cycling have the same goal - to make cycling safer and more competitive, to the extent possible for cyclists in a competitive environment, which is expected to be faster, more aggressive and more competitive.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: ຕະຫຼອດປີ 1960, ເບຼຊິນສະກີ (Brzezinski) ໄດ້ເຮັດວຽກໃຫ້ກັບທ່ານ ຈອນ ເອັບ ເຄເນດີ (John F. Kennedy) ໃນຖານະເປັນທີ່ປຶກສາຂອງລາວ ແລະ ຫຼັງຈາກນັ້ນກໍເປັນຝ່າຍບໍລິຫານໃຫ້ກັບ ລິນດອນ ບີ. ຈອນສັນ (Lyndon B. Johnson).
mt: 1960, Brzezinski advised John F. Kennedy on Laos and later became a foreign policy adviser to Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: ໃນລະຫວ່າງການຄັດເລືອກໃນປີ 1976 ລາວໄດ້ໃຫ້ຄຳປຶກສາແກ່ທ່ານ Carter ກ່ຽວກັບນະໂຍບາຍການຕ່າງປະເທດ, ຫຼັງຈາກນັ້ນກໍຮັບໜ້າທີ່ເປັນທີ່ປຶກສາດ້ານຄວາມໝັ້ນຄົງແຫ່ງຊາດ (NSA) ແຕ່ປີ 1977 ເຖິງປີ 1981 ສືບທອດຕຳແໜ່ງຕໍ່ຈາກ Henry Kissinger.
mt: 1976, Laos offered to mediate between the United States and North Vietnam, after which it was visited by National Security Advisor Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: ໃນຖານະເປັນ NSA, ລາວໄດ້ຊ່ວຍທ່ານ Carter ໃນການດຳເນີນການດ້ານການທູດຂອງໂລກເຊັ່ນ: Camp David Accords ໃນປີ 1978; ເຮັດໃຫ້ການພົວພັນລະຫວ່າງອາເມລິກາ - ຈີນເປັນປົກກະຕິໃນທ້າຍຊຸມປີ 1970; ທັງໃນການປະຕິວັດອີຣານ ເຊິ່ງກໍໃຫ້ເກີດວິກິດການຕົວປະກັນອີຣານໃນປີ 1979 ແລະ ການບຸກໂຈມຕີຂອງໂຊວຽດໃນອັຟການິສຖານ (Afghanistan) ປີ 1979.
mt: In the context of the NSA, Laos helped Carter in the Middle East peace process, such as the Camp David Accords in 1978; the normalization of relations between the United States and China in the late 1970s; and the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iranian Hostage Crisis in 1979 and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: ຮູບເງົາທີ່ມີ Ryan Gosling ແລະ Emma Stone, ໄດ້ຮັບການສະເໜີຊື່ໃນທຸກໂຮງຮູບເງົາ.
mt: The film starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone was nominated for every major award.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling ແລະ Stone ໄດ້ຮັບການນໍາສະເໜີຊື່ເຂົ້າຊິງສໍາລັບນັກສະແດງຊາຍ ແລະ ນັກສະແດງຍິງດີເດັ່ນຕາມລຳດັບ.
mt: Gosling and Stone were nominated for Best Actor and Best Actress respectively.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: ການສະເໜີຊື່ໃນສາຂາອື່ນໆປະກອບມີ ສາຂາຮູບພາບດີເດັ່ນ, ຜູ້ກຳກັບຮູບເງົາດີເດັ່ນ, ການສະແດງຮູບເງົາດີເດັ່ນ, ການອອກແບບເສື້ອຜ້າດີເດັ່ນ, ການຕັດຕໍ່ຮູບເງົາດີເດັ່ນ, ສຽງປະກອບຮູບເງົາຕົ້ນສະບັບດີເດັ່ນ, ການອອກແບບການຜະລິດດີເດັ່ນ, ການຕັດຕໍ່ສຽງດີເດັ່ນ, ການປະສົມສຽງ ແລະ ບົດຮູບເງົາຕົ້ນສະບັບດີເດັ່ນ.

src: ສອງເພງຈາກຮູບເງົາ Audition (The Fools Who Dream) ແລະ City of Stars, ໄດ້ຮັບການສະເໜີຊື່ໃຫ້ເປັນເພງຕົ້ນສະບັບທີ່ດີທີ່ສຸດ. ສະຕູດິໂອ Lionsgate ໄດ້ຮັບການສະເໜີຊື່ເຂົ້າຊິງ 26 ລາງວັນ ເຊິ່ງຫຼາຍກວ່າຫຼາຍກວ່າສະຕູດິໂອອື່ນໆ.
mt: "Audition (The Fools Who Dream)" and "City of Stars" were nominated for Best Original Song. Lionsgate received 26 nominations, more than any other studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: ໃນຕອນແລງວັນອາທິດ, ປະທານາທິບໍດີສະຫະລັດທ່ານ Donald Trump ໄດ້ປະກາດໃນຖະແຫຼງການທີ່ສົ່ງຜ່ານເລຂາທິການຂ່າວວ່າກອງທັບສະຫະລັດຈະອອກຈາກຊີເຣຍ.
mt: In the early hours of Wednesday, U.S. President Donald Trump announced in a televised address that U.S. troops would be withdrawn from Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: ການປະກາດດັ່ງກ່າວເກີດຂຶ້ນຫຼັງຈາກ Trump ໄດ້ລົມໂທລະສັບກັບປະທານາທິບໍດີຕຸລະກີ Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
mt: The situation escalated after Trump called Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: ປະເທດຕຸລະກີເຂົ້າຄວບຄຸມຕົວນັກຮົບຂອງ ISIS ທີ່ຖືກຈັບໄດ້ເຊິ່ງຖະແຫຼງການດັ່ງກ່າວໄລະບຸວ່າບັນດາປະເທດເອີຣົບໄດ້ປະຕິເສດທີ່ຈະສົ່ງຕົວກັບຄືນປະເທດ.
mt: The European Union has agreed to send troops to the country.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: ທິດສະດີໄດ້ຖືກເຜີຍແຜ່ຢ່າງກວ້າງຂວາງ ນີ້ບໍ່ພຽງແຕ່ຢືນຢັນວ່າຢ່າງໜ້ອຍໄດໂນເສົາບາງຈຳພວກມີຂົນ, ແຕ່ບໍ່ສາມາດໃຫ້ລາຍລະອຽດໂດຍທົ່ວໄປຂອງຊາກດຶກດຳບັນໄດ້ ເຊັ່ນ ລາຍລະອຽດກ່ຽວກັບສີ ແລະ ການຈັດລຽງແບບສາມມິຕິ.
mt: The investigation was limited to the immediate area, not the entire crash site, such as the color and arrangement of the wreckage.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: . ນັກວິທະຍາສາດກ່າວວ່າຂົນຂອງສັດປ່າໂຕນີ້ຄືສີນໍ້າເກົາລັດຢູ່ທາງເທິງທີ່ຈາງລົງ ຫຼື ສີແຄໂຣທີນອຍຢູ່ທາງລຸ່ມ.
mt: Scientists say the tree's trunk is a hollow cylinder, or a solid core with a hollow center.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: ການຄົ້ນຫາດັ່ງກ່າວ ຍັງເຮັດໃຫ້ເຮົາຮູ້ຢ່າງເລິກເຊິ່ງ ກ່ຽວກັບວິວັດທະນາການຂອງຂົນໃນໂຕນົກ.
mt: The incident also revealed the extent of the damage to the runway.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: ເນື່ອງຈາກວ່າຂົນຂອງໄດໂນເສົາບໍ່ມີກ້ານ ຫຼື ເອີ້ນວ່າ ກ້ານຂົນທີ່ພັດທະນາໄດ້ດີ, ແຕ່ວ່າມັນມີຄຸນລັກສະນະອື່ນໆຂອງຂົນຄື - ມີໜາມ ແລະ ເສັ້ນຂົນ - ນັກຄົ້ນຄວ້າໄດ້ຊີ້ແຈງໃຫ້ເຫັນວ່າກ້ານຂົນມີຄວາມເປັນໄປໄດ້ວ່າຈະເປັນການພັດທະນາວິວັດທະນາການຊ່ວງສຸດທ້າຍຈົນມາເປັນຂົນຕ່າງໆເຫຼົ່ານີ້.
mt: Because the car's engine was not running or the driver was not responding, the driver was identified as a man with a similar car - with a hood and a tailgate - who was driving erratically and appeared to be intoxicated.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: ໂຄງປະກອບຂອງຂົນນົກຊີ້ໃຫ້ເຫັນວ່າພວກມັນບໍ່ໄດ້ຖືກນຳໃຊ້ໃນການບິນແຕ່ເປັນການຄວບຄຸມອຸນຫະພູມ ຫຼື ການສະແດງຜົນ. ນັກຄົ້ນຄວ້າແນະນຳວ່າ, ເຖິງແມ່ນວ່ານີ້ແມ່ນຫາງຂອງໄດໂນເສົາໜຸ່ມ, ຕົວຢ່າງກໍສະແດງຂົນນົກສໍາລັບໂຕເຕັມໄວ ແລະ ບໍ່ແມ່ນລູກໄກ່.
mt: The components of the engine suggest that it was not used in flight, but rather in ground testing or static fire. The engine is not a car engine, but rather a jet engine, and is not a jet engine for a passenger jet, but rather a jet engine for a military jet.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: ນັກວິໄຈແນະນໍາວ່າ, ເຖິງແມ້ວ່ານີ້ຈະເປັນຫາງຂອງໄດໂນເສົາໂຕນ້ອຍ ແຕ່ຕົວຢ່າງກໍສະແດງໃຫ້ເຫັນຂົນສັດໃຫຍ່ບໍ່ແມ່ນລູກໄກ່.
mt: The researchers say, until now, this has been a small, but noticeable, step in the evolution of flight.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: ລະເບີດລົດໄດ້ແຕກຢູ່ທີ່ສຳນັກງານໃຫຍ່ຕຳຫຼວດໃນເມືອງ Gaziantep, ປະເທດຕວກກີ ໃນຕອນເຊົ້າຂອງມື້ວານນີ້ ໄດ້ສັງຫານເຈົ້າໜ້າທີ່ຕຳຫຼວດສອງຄົນ ແລະ ໄດ້ຮັບບາດເຈັບອີກຫຼາຍກວ່າຊາວຄົນ.
mt: The explosion killed six people and injured more than 100 others.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: ຫ້ອງວ່າການປົກຄອງແຂວງ ກ່າວວ່າ ຜູ້ບາດເຈັບຈຳນວນສິບເກົ້າຄົນ ແມ່ນເຈົ້າໜ້າທີ່ຕຳຫຼວດ.
mt: Police in the province of Chiang Mai say the driver of the car was a 45-year-old man.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: ຕຳຫຼວດກ່າວວ່າພວກເຂົາສົງໃສວ່າເປັນກຸ່ມຫົວຮຸນແຮງ Daesh (ISIL) ເຊິ່ງເປັນທະຫານທີ່ຮັບຜິດຊອບໃນການໂຈມຕີດັ່ງກ່າວ.
mt: The group said it was a Daesh (ISIL) cell, which is under investigation.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: ເຂົາເຈົ້າພົບວ່າດວງອາທິດເຮັດວຽກຕາມຫຼັກການພື້ນຖານດຽວກັນກັບດວງດາວອື່ນໆເຊັ່ນ: ກິດຈະກຳຂອງດວງດາວທັງໝົດທີ່ຢູ່ໃນລະບົບພົບວ່າຖືກຂັບເຄື່ອນໄດ້ຍ້ອນການເຮືອງແສງ, ການໝູນຂອງພວກມັນ ແລະ ບໍ່ແມ່ນຍ້ອນສິິ່ງອື່ນ.
mt: The coach said the team's entire starting lineup, which was playing in a closed stadium, was hit by tear gas, pepper spray and other irritants.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: ການເຮືອງແສງ ແລະ ການໝຸນວຽນໄດ້ຖືກນໍາໃຊ້ຮ່ວມກັນເພື່ອກໍານົດຈໍານວນ Rossby ຂອງດາວ, ເຊິ່ງມັນກ່ຽວຂ້ອງກັບກະແສພາສມາ.
mt: A cold front and a warm front were combined to reduce the amount of Rossby waves, which are associated with jet streams.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: ຍິ່ງຈໍານວນ Rossby ນ້ອຍເທົ່າໃດ, ດາວທີ່ໃຊ້ງານກໍໜ້ອຍລົງເມື່ອທຽບກັບການປີ້ນກັບຂອງສະໜາມແມ່ເຫຼັກ.
mt: A small Rossby wave, a type of jet stream, is seen here dipping southward as it approaches the airport.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: ອີວາຊາກີ (Iwasaki) ໄດ້ປະສົບກັບບັນຫາຫຍຸ້ງຍາກຫຼາຍຄັ້ງ ໃນລະຫວ່າງການເດີນທາງຂອງລາວ.
mt: Iwasaki has been in and out of jail several times during the Lao trip.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: ລາວຖືກໂຈນສະລັດປຸ້ນ, ຖືກໝາວໍ້ໂຈມຕີທຳຮ້າຍໃນ ຕີເບດ, ໄດ້ໜີການແຕ່ງງານທີ່ ປະເທດເນປານ ແລະ ຖືກຈັບໃນປະເທດ ອິນເດຍ.
mt: Laos was bombed by the United States, was hit by a power outage in the country of Nepal and was arrested in the country of India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: ຂະໜາດມາດຕະຖານ 802.11n ສາມາດເຮັດວຽກໄດ້ກັບທັງສອງຄວາມຖີ່ 2.4Ghz ແລະ 5.0Ghz.
mt: 802.11n technology can operate on both 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz bands.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: ຖ້າວ່າສະຖານີຫຼັກມີວິທະຍຸຄູ່ ມັນຈະຊ່ວຍໃຫ້ມັນສາມາດເຮັດວຽກຢູ່ເບື້ອງຫຼັງຮ່ວມກັນໄດ້ກັບ 802.11a, 802.11b ແລະ 802.11g.
mt: 802.11n will help it coexist with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: ຄວາມໄວຂອງ 802.11n ແມ່ນໄວກວ່າຂອງລຸ້ນກ່ອນຫຼາຍໂດຍມີການສົ່ງຜ່ານທາງທິດສະດີສູງສຸດຢູ່ທີ່ 600Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n is said to be faster than previous standards by up to 600 Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall ຜູ້ທີ່ໄດ້ແຕ່ງງານກັບເດັກນ້ອຍສອງຄົນ, ບໍ່ໄດ້ສ້າງຄວາມປະທັບໃຈທີ່ດີຫຍັງໃຫ້ກັບ Miller ຜູ້ທີ່ກ່ຽວຂ້ອງກັບເລື່ອງນີ້ເລີຍ.
mt: Duvall, who was performing with his young daughter, was not injured in the incident, which Miller, who was associated with the story, said was over.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: ເມື່ອຖືກຖາມເຖິງຄວາມຄິດເຫັນ, Miller ກໍໄດ້ກ່າວວ່າ “Mike ເວົ້າຫຼາຍຄັ້ງໃນລະຫວ່າງການໄຕ່ສວນວ່າ... ຂ້ອຍກຽມພ້ອມແລ້ວດັ່ງນັ້ນຂ້ອຍບໍ່ບໍ່ໄດ້ສິ່ງທີ່ລາວເວົ້າ.”
mt: When Miller was asked, he said, "Mike said several times in the interview... I was just joking, I wasn't saying that."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: ທ່ານ Hu ກ່າວວ່າ, ພວກເຮົາຈະພະຍາຍາມຫຼຸດການປ່ອຍອາຍກາກໂບນິກຕໍ່ຫົວໜ່ວຍຂອງ GDP ໂດຍອັດຕາທີ່ໜ້າສັງເກດໃນປີ 2020 ຈາກລະດັບ 2005.
mt: Mr. Hu said, the government will strive to reduce the gap between the per capita GDP and the world average in 2020 from the level of 2005.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: ລາວບໍ່ໄດ້ກຳນົດຕົວເລກສຳລັບການຕັດອອກ ເຊິ່ງກ່າວວ່າພວກເຂົາຈະເຮັດໂດຍອີງໃສ່ຜົນໄດ້ຮັບທາງດ້ານເສດຖະກິດຂອງຈີນ.
mt: Laos has not approved the number of Chinese tourists, which they say will benefit the country's economy.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: ທ່ານ Hu ໄດ້ຊຸກຍູ້ໃຫ້ບັນດາປະເທດກຳລັງພັດທະນາ “ໃຫ້ຫຼີກລ້ຽງວິທີການທີ່ສ້າງມົນລະພິດໄວ້ ແລະ ຈຶ່ງມາທຳຄວາມສະອາດຕາມຫຼັງ.”
mt: Mr. Hu urged the country to “build a modern, harmonious society and achieve the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation.”
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: ລາວກ່າວຕື່ມວ່າ “ແນວໃດກໍຕາມ ເຂົາເຈົ້າບໍ່ຄວນຖືກຮຽກຮ້ອງໃຫ້ປະຕິບັດຕາມພັນທະຄວາມຮັບຜິດຊອບຕ່າງໆ ນອກເໜືອໄປຈາກຂັ້ນຕອນໃນການພັດທະນາ, ຄວາມຮັບຜິດຊອບ ແລະ ຄວາມສາມາດຂອງເຂົາເຈົ້າ.”
mt: “Whatever, my lord, was not happy with the various forms of treatment, including the injection, the treatment and the ability of my lord.”
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: ກຸ່ມການສຶກສາອີຣັກໄດ້ນຳສະເໜີບົດລາຍງານຂອງຕົນໃນເວລາ 12.00 ຕາມເວລາສາກົນຂອງມື້ນີ້.
mt: 12.00 pm local time today.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: ມັນເຕືອນວ່າບໍ່ມີໃຜສາມາດຮັບປະກັນໄດ້ວ່າໃນຈຸດໆນີ້ການກະທຳໃດໆໃນປະເທດອີຣັກຈະສາມາດຢຸດສົງຄາມດ້ານສາສະໜາ, ເພີ່ມທະວີຄວາມຮຸນແຮງ ຫຼື ກ້າວສູ່ຄວາມວຸ່ນວາຍໄດ້.
mt: It is believed that the situation in the country of Iraq will be able to wage religious war, increase tension or go beyond the level of violence.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: ການລາຍງານດັ່ງກ່າວເປີດເຜີຍພ້ອມກັບຂໍ້ອ້າງຂອງການໂຕ້ວາທີຢ່າງເປີດກວ້າງ ແລະ ການສ້າງມະຕິມະຫາຊົນຂອງສະຫະລັດກ່ຽວກັບນະໂຍບາຍທີ່ມີຕໍ່ຕາເວັນອອກກາງ.
mt: The report was accompanied by a photograph of the damaged and burning aircraft, and a U.S. military statement about the incident.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: ບົດລາຍງານດັ່ງກ່າວມີຄວາມສໍາຄັນຢ່າງຍິ່ງໃນເກືອບທຸກໆແງ່ມຸມຂອງນະໂຍບາຍໃນປະຈຸບັນຂອງຜູ້ບໍລິຫານຕໍ່ກັບອີຣັກ ແລະ ມັນກະຕຸ້ນໃຫ້ມີການປ່ຽນແປງທິດທາງໃນທັນທີ.
mt: The article has a small correction to the previous version of the article's direction in the early morning.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: ຂໍ້ທຳອິດໃນບັນດາ 78 ຂໍ້ສະເໜີແນະຄືຄວນມີການລິເລີ່ມທາງການທູດຄັ້ງໃໝ່ກ່ອນໝົດປີນີ້ເພື່ອຮັກສາຄວາມປອດໄພຊາຍແດນອີຣັກຈາກການແຊກແຊງຂອງສັດຕູ ແລະ ເພື່ອສ້າງຄວາມສຳພັນທາງການທູດກັບປະເທດເພື່ອນບ້ານອີກເທື່ອ.
mt: 78 of the 80 recommendations in the report were implemented before the end of the year to prevent the spread of foot-and-mouth disease from sheep and to improve border control with neighbouring countries.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: ສະມາຊິກສະພາຂັ້ນສູງຄົນປະຈຸບັນ ແລະ ປະທານາທິບໍດີຍິງຂອງປະເທດອາເຈນຕິນາທ່ານນາງ Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner ໄດ້ປະກາດຕຳແໜ່ງປະທານາທິບໍດີຂອງລາວໃນຕອນແລງຂອງມື້ວານນີ້ຢູ່ທີ່ La Plata ເຊິ່ງເປັນເມືອງທີ່ຢູ່ຫ່າງຈາກ Buenos Aires 50 ກິໂລແມັດ (31 ໄມລ໌).
mt: Members of the Argentine Congress and President Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner of the country's ruling party, the Front for Victory, have announced that the country will hold a referendum on the legalization of abortion in the next few months in La Plata, a city near Buenos Aires 50 kilometers (31 miles).
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: ທ່ານນາງ Kirchner ໄດ້ປະກາດຄວາມຕັ້ງໃຈຂອງລາວໃນການດຳລົງຕຳແໜ່ງໃນຖານະປະທານາທິບໍດີຢູ່ທີ່ໂຮງລະຄອນແຫ່ງຊາດ Argentine ເຊິ່ງເປັນສະຖານທີ່ດຽວກັນທີ່ເພິ່ນເຄີຍໃຊ້ເພື່ອເລີ່ມຕົ້ນການໂຄສະນາຫາສຽງໃນປີ 2005 ຂອງເພິ່ນໃນຖານະເປັນສະມາຊິກຂອງຄະນະຜູ້ແທນແຂວງ Buenos Aires.
mt: President Kirchner declared a state of emergency in the province of Buenos Aires, where the riots began in 2005 as a protest against the government.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: ການໂຕ້ວາທີເກີດຈາກການຖ້ຽງກັນກ່ຽວກັບການໃຊ້ຈ່າຍໃນການບັນເທົາທຸກ ແລະ ການສ້າງສາຄືນໃໝ່ຍ້ອນພາຍຸເຫີລິເຄນ Katrina ຊຶ່ງທ່ານໜຶ່ງຈາກພັກອານຸລັກນິຍົມໄດ້ຕິດປ້າຍຕະຫຼົກວ່າ “Bush's New Orleans Deal.”
mt: The storm was caused by the failure to maintain and upgrade levees damaged by Hurricane Katrina, which one critic called "Bush's New Orleans Deal."
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: ການວິພາກວິຈານຢ່າງຫຼວງຫຼາຍກ່ຽວກັບຄວາມພະຍາຍາມໃນການຟື້ນຟູບູລະນະໄດ້ມຸ່ງເນັ້ນໄປທີ່ການຕັດສິນສັນຍາການຟື້ນຟູບູລະນະໃຫ້ແກ່ຜູ້ທີ່ຢູ່ພາຍໃນ Washington ທີ່ຖືກຮັບຮູ້.
mt: The incident has drawn widespread attention in Washington, where it was widely reported.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: ຄົນຫຼາຍກວ່າສີ່ລ້ານຄົນໄປທີ່ Rome ເພື່ອເຂົ້າຮ່ວມງານສົບ.
mt: More than 9,000 people are traveling to Rome to attend the event.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: ຈຳນວນຄົນທີ່ມາແມ່ນມີຈຳນວນຫຼວງຫຼາຍເກີນໄປ ຈົນວ່າທຸກຄົນບໍ່ສາມາດເຂົ້າໄປໃນງານສົບໃນຈະຕຸລັດ ເຊນທ໌ ປີເຕີ (St. Peter's Square).
mt: The number of people killed is rising, with each person unable to enter the funeral in St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: ຈໍໂທລະພາບຂະໜາດໃຫຍ່ຈຳນວນຫຼວງຫຼາຍໄດ້ຖືກຕິດຕັ້ງຢູ່ຕາມສະຖານທີ່ຕ່າງໆຂອງ Rome ເພື່ອໃຫ້ປະຊາຊົນໄດ້ຮ່ວມຊົມພິທີດັ່ງກ່າວ.
mt: Aerial footage of Rome was set up at various locations to allow citizens to participate in the event.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: ໃນອື່ນໆຫຼາຍເມືອງຂອງອີຕາລີ ແລະ ໃນທົ່ວໂລກໂດຍສະເພາະແມ່ນໃນປະເທດໂປໂລຍກໍໄດ້ມີການຕິດຕັ້ງແບບດຽວກັນເຊິ່ງມີປະຊາກອນຈຳນວນຫຼວງຫຼາຍຮ່ວມຊົມ.
mt: In other cities across Italy and throughout the country by the end of the day, the protests had drawn tens of thousands of people.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: ນັກປະຫວັດສາດໄດ້ວິພາກວິຈານນະໂຍບາຍທີ່ຜ່ານມາຂອງ FBI ກ່ຽວກັບການມຸ່ງເນັ້ນໃສ່ແຫຼ່ງທີ່ມາຂອງຄະດີຕ່າງໆທີ່ແກ້ໄດ້ງ່າຍ ໂດຍສະເພາະກໍລະນີຂອງລົດທີ່ຖືກລັກ ດ້ວຍຈຸດປະສົງທີ່ຈະເພີ່ມອັດຕາຜົນສຳເລັດຂອງໜ່ວຍງານ.
mt: A Justice Department official said the FBI has been investigating the shooting of a car by a police officer in the city of Ferguson, Missouri, which has sparked protests.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: ສະພາ Congress ເລີ່ມໃຫ້ເງິນສະໜັບສະໜູນໂຄງການກ່ຽວກັບການເຮັດລາມົກອານາຈານໃນງົບປະມານປີ 2005 ແລະ ລະບຸວ່າ FBI ຈະຕ້ອງອຸທິດ 10 ຕົວແທນໃຫ້ກັບສື່ລາມົກສຳລັບຜູ້ໃຫຍ່.
mt: The House of Representatives began debate on a bill to fund the Department of Homeland Security for fiscal year 2005 and voted to refer 10 Democrats to the House Ethics Committee for their role in the 2002 Florida ballot recount.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa ໄດ້ສ້າງໂອກາດໄດ້ຄະແນນສູງສຸດ, 70 ຄັ້ງແລ່ນ ພຽງໃນ 41 ໜ່ວຍບານ ໂດຍການຕີ 11 ສີ່ ແລະ 2 ຫົກ.
mt: 70-year-old Robin Uthappa scored a century, 70 not out in 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: ນັກຕີແບັດຕຳແໜ່ງກາງ, Sachin Tendulkar ແລະ Rahul Dravid ເຮັດຜົນງານໄດ້ດີ ແລະ ເຮັດໄດ້ການຮ່ວມມື ໜຶ່ງຮ້ອຍ-ການແລ່ນ.
mt: Middle-order batsmen Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid scored 50s and shared a 100-run partnership.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: ແຕ່ວ່າຫຼັງຈາກເສຍປະຕູຂອງກັບຕັນທີມອິນເດຍພຽງແຕ່ເຮັດ 36 ແລ່ນ, ສູນເສຍ 7 ປະຕູກ່ອນສິ້ນສຸດເວລາ.
mt: 36 minutes after the first crash, the second crash occurred.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: ປະທານາທິບໍດີຂອງສະຫະລັດ George W. Bush ໄດ້ເດີນທາງໄປຮອດສິງກະໂປໃນຕອນເຊົ້າຂອງວັນທີ 16 ພະຈິກໂດຍເປັນການເລີ່ມຕົ້ນຂອງການເດີນທາງໄປຢ້ຽມຢາມບັນດາປະເທດອາຊີ.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush traveled to Asia in the afternoon of October 16, beginning a tour of Asian countries.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: ລາວໄດ້ຮັບການຕ້ອນຮັບຈາກທ່ານຮອງນາຍົກລັດຖະມົນຕີສິງກະໂປ Wong Kan Seng ແລະ ໄດ້ປຶກສາຫາລືກ່ຽວກັບບັນຫາການຄ້າ ແລະ ການກໍ່ການຮ້າຍກັບທ່ານ lee Hsien Loong ນາຍົກລັດຖະມົນຕີຂອງສິງກະໂປ.
mt: Laos received a visit from Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and held talks on trade and investment with Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: ຫຼັງຈາກແພ້ໃນການເລືອກຕັ້ງກາງສະໄໝ, ທ່ານ Bush ໄດ້ບອກຜູ້ເຂົ້າຮ່ວມປະຊຸມກ່ຽວກັບການຂະຫຍາຍຕົວຂອງການຄ້າໃນອາຊີ.
mt: After the meeting, Mr. Bush met with business leaders on trade in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: ນາຍົກລັດຖະມົນຕີ Stephen Harper ໄດ້ຕົກລົງທີ່ຈະສົ່ງກົດໝາຍ “Clean Air Act” ຂອງລັດຖະບານໃຫ້ຄະນະກໍາມະການພັກທຸກພາກສ່ວນເພື່ອທົບທວນກ່ອນອ່ານຄັ້ງທີສອງຫຼັງຈາກການພົບປະກັບຜູ້ນຳ Jack Layton ຂອງ NDP 25 ນາທີໃນວັນອັງຄານ.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has announced that the government will introduce a “Clean Air Act” to Parliament before reading it to NDP leader Jack Layton 25 times on Monday.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: ທ່ານ Layton ໄດ້ຮຽກຮ້ອງໃຫ້ມີການປ່ຽນແປງກົດໝາຍດ້ານສະພາບແວດລ້ອມຂອງນັກອະນຸລັກນິຍົມໃນລະຫວ່າງການປະຊຸມກັບນາຍົກລັດຖະມົນຕີ, ເຊິ່ງໄດ້ຮຽກຮ້ອງໃຫ້ມີ “ການຮ່າງຄືນໃໝ່ຢ່າງລະອຽດ ແລະ ຄົບຖ້ວນ” ຂອງກົດໝາຍດ້ານສະພາບແວດລ້ອມຂອງພັກອະນຸລັກນິຍົມ.
mt: Layton urged the House to change the "archaic and cumbersome" language of the law governing the intelligence community, which he said was "outdated and confusing."
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: ນັບຕັ້ງແຕ່ລັດຖະບານກາງໄດ້ກ້າວເຂົ້າມາຮັບຜິດຊອບການໃຫ້ເງິນທຶນຊ່ວຍເຫຼືອແກ່ໂຮງໝໍ Mersey ໃນເມືອງ Devonport ໃນລັດ Tasmania, ການປົກຄອງຂອງລັດ ແລະ ສະມາຊິກຜູ້ແທນລາສະດອນບາງທ່ານໄດ້ຕຳໜິຕິຕຽນຕໍ່ການກະທຳດັ່ງກ່າວວ່າເປັນການສະແດງຄວາມສາມາດເພື່ອນຳໄປສູ່ການເລືອກຕັ້ງກາງທີ່ຈະເກີດໃນເດືອນພະຈິກ.
mt: The federal government, state and Tasmanian parliamentary representatives have been urged to intervene in the proposed closure of the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, which has been criticised as a move to cut costs.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: ແຕ່ທ່ານນາຍົກລັດຖະມົນຕີ ຈອນ ຮາວເວີດ (John Howard) ໄດ້ກ່າວວ່າການກະທຳດັ່ງກ່າວແມ່ນເພື່ອຄຸ້ມຄອງສິ່ງອຳນວຍຄວາມສະດວກຕ່າງໆຂອງໂຮງໝໍບໍ່ໃຫ້ຖືກມອງຕົກຕ່ຳຈາກລັດຖະບານຂອງລັດ ທັດສະມາເນຍ ໂດຍການໃຫ້ເງິນເພີ່ມ 45 ລ້ານໂດລາອົດສະຕາລີ.
mt: But Prime Minister John Howard (Australia) said the move was to protect Australia's national interest by increasing the tax on petrol by 45 cents a litre.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: ອີງຕາມຂ່າວລ່າສຸດ, ລະດັບນ້ຳທະເລບົ່ງບອກວ່າຈະເກີດຄື້ນສຸນາມິຂຶ້ນ. ຊຶ່ງໄດ້ມີການບັນທຶກວ່າມີຄື້ນສຸນາມີເກີດຂຶ້ນໃກ້ກັບເມືອງ ປາໂກ ປາໂກ (Pago Pago) ແລະ ເມືອງ ນີອູເອ (Niue).
mt: According to the latest reports, the flooding is expected to cause a tsunami.  The flooding is reported to be affecting the towns of Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: ບໍ່ມີລາຍງານຄວາມເສຍຫາຍ ຫຼື ການບາດເຈັບໜັກໃດໆໃນປະເທດ ຕົງກາ, ແຕ່ວ່າໄຟຟ້າໄດ້ສູນເສຍໄປຊົ່ວຄາວ, ຊຶ່ງມີລາຍງານວ່າ ໄດ້ກີດຂວາງເຈົ້າໜ້າທີ່ຂອງ ຕົງກາ ຈາກການໄດ້ຮັບການເຕືອນໄພສຸນາມິ ທີ່ອອກໂດຍ PTWC.
mt: There were no immediate reports of damage or injuries in Tonga, but a tsunami warning was issued by PTWC after the quake.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: ໂຮງຮຽນສິບສີ່ແຫ່ງໃນລັດຮາວາຍທີ່ຕັ້ງຢູ່ ຫຼື ໃກ້ແຄມຝັ່ງທະເລໄດ້ຖືກປິດລົງໃນວັນພຸດທັງໝົດເຖິງວ່າຄຳເຕືອນຈະຖືກຍົກເລີກແລ້ວກໍຕາມ.
mt: 9 schools in the province of Huelva, Spain, were closed on Tuesday after a bomb threat.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: ປະທານາທິບໍດີສະຫະລັດທ່ານ George W. Bush ໄດ້ຍິນດີຕໍ່ການປະກາດດັ່ງກ່າວ.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush has commended the announcement.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: ພິທິກອນຂອງ Bush ແມ່ນ Gordon Johndroe ເວົ້າວ່າເກົາຫຼີເໜືອ “ເປັນບາດກ້າວທີສຳຄັນໄປສູ່ເປົ້າໝາຍໃນການບັນລຸການປົດປ່ອຍອາວຸດນິວເຄຍຂອງເກົາຫຼີ.”
mt: "North Korea is a bad actor in the nuclear standoff with the United States," said Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe.
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: ລົມພາຍຸລຽງຕາມລາຍຊື່ລູກທີ່ສິບຂອງພາຍຸເຮີຣິເຄນປະຈຳລະດູເຂດມະຫາສະໝຸດ ອັດລັງຕິກ,ພາຍຸເຂດຮ້ອນ ເຈີຣີ (Jerry), ໄດ້ກໍ່ຕົວຂຶ້ນໃນມະຫາສະໝຸດອັດລັງຕິກໃນມື້ນີ້.
mt: 4-year-old Jerry, a German Shepherd, was euthanized in the city of Edmonton, Alberta, Canada, on this day.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: ສູນພາຍຸເຮີລິເຄນແຫ່ງຊາດ (NHC) ກ່າວວ່າໃນເວລານີ້ລົມພາຍຸ Jerry ບໍ່ໄດ້ກໍ່ໃຫ້ເກີດໄພຄຸກຄາມໃດໆຕໍ່ເຂດພື້ນດິນເທື່ອ.
mt: At this time, Jerry is not expected to bring any tropical storm or hurricane conditions to land areas.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: ຄະນະວິສາວະກອນຂອງສະຫະລັດອາເມລິກາຄາດການວ່າປະລິມານນໍ້າຝົນ 6 ນີ້ວ ສາມາດທໍາລາຍເຂື່ອນທີ່ເສຍຫາຍກ່ອນໜ້ານີ້.
mt: 6.0 magnitude earthquake strikes near the dam that failed earlier this year.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: ເມືອງ ເດີ ນາຍທ໌ ວອດ (The Ninth Ward) ທີ່ເຫັນວ່າມີນ້ຳຖ້ວມສູງເຖິງ 20 ຟຸດ ໃນຊ່ວງພາຍຸເຮີຣີີເຄນ ຄາທຼີນາ (Katrina), ປະຈຸບັນແມ່ນມີນ້ຳສູງລະດັບເຖິງແອວເນື່ອງຈາກນ້ຳລົ້ນຈາກເຂື່ອນທີ່ໃກ້ຄຽງ.
mt: The Ninth Ward, which was flooded by up to 20 feet (6.1 m) of water during Hurricane Katrina, is now flooded by up to 8 feet (2.4 m) of water from the levee breaches.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: ນຳໄດ້ໄຫຼລົ້ນເທິງເຂື່ອນເປັນບໍລິເວນກວ້າງ 100 ຟຸດ.
mt: 100-foot (30 m) antenna collapsed.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: ຜູ້ບໍລິຫານລວມ ທ່ານ ອາດຳ ເຄີເດິນ (Adam Cuerden) ໄດ້ສະແດງຄວາມຜິດຫວັງຕໍ່ການລຶບຂໍ້ມູນ ໃນເວລາທີ່ລາວໄດ້ໂອ້ລົມກັບ ວີກີ່ນີວສ໌ (Wikinews) ໃນເດືອນແລ້ວນີ້.
mt: 2014-12-31: Wikinews contributor Adam Cuerden has been suspended from editing Wikinews in December.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: ລາວ [Wales] ຕົວະພວກເຮົາຕັ້ງແຕ່ເລີ່ມຕົ້ນ. ທໍາອິດໂດຍເຮັດຄືກັບວ່ານີ້ແມ່ນເຫດຜົນທາງກົດໝາຍ. ເທືອທີ່ສອງທຳທ່າວ່າລາວກຳລັງຟັງພວກເຮົາຢູ່ຈົນເຖິງການລົບງານສີລະປະຂອງລາວ.
mt: 1. The Welsh people have been around since the beginning. This is a matter of historical record. 2. The Welsh are a Celtic people. 3. The Welsh language is a Celtic language. 4. The Welsh are not Germanic. 5. The Welsh are not English. 6. The Welsh are not British. 7. The Welsh are not Scottish. 8. The Welsh are not Irish. 9. The Welsh are not French. 10. The Welsh are not Spanish. 11. The Welsh are not Italian. 12. The Welsh are not Portuguese. 13. The Welsh are not Dutch. 14. The Welsh are not Norwegian. 15. The Welsh are not Swedish. 16. The Welsh are not Danish. 17. The Welsh are not Finnish. 18. The Welsh are not Estonian. 19. The Welsh are not Latvian. 20. The Welsh are not Lithuanian. 21. The Welsh are not Polish. 22. The Welsh are not Czech. 23. The Welsh are not Slovak. 24. The Welsh are not Hungarian. 25. The Welsh are not Romanian. 26. The Welsh are not Bulgarian. 27. The Welsh are not Greek. 28. The Welsh are not Turkish. 29. The Welsh are not Russian. 30. The Welsh are not Ukrainian. 31. The Welsh are not Belarusian. 32. The Welsh are not Kazakh. 33. The Welsh are not Kyrgyz. 34. ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: ບັນຫາຂອງສັງຄົມໄດ້ເຮັດໃຫ້ເກີດຄວາມພະຍາຍາມທີ່ເປັນທີ່ຍອມຮັບກັນທົ່ງໄປໃນການຮ່າງນະໂຍບາຍອີງໃສ່ເນື້ອຫາທາງເພດຜ່ານເວັບໄຊເຊິ່ງເປັນຜູ້ສະເໜີຂໍ້ມູນໃຫ້ສື່ມວນຊົນທີ່ໄດ້ຮັບອະນຸຍາດຢ່າງເປີດກວ້າງຫຼາຍລ້ານຄົນ.
mt: Social media posts that were widely shared on the internet were reported to have been made by a person who was identified as a suspect.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: ວຽກທີ່ເຮັດສ່ວນໃຫຍ່ແມ່ນທາງທິດສະດີ, ແຕ່ໂປຣແກຮມຖືກຂຽນຂຶ້ນເພື່ອຈຳລອງການສັງເກດການທີ່ເຮັດຈາກຈັກກະວານຂອງ Sagittarius.
mt: The incident was a collision, but the crash was written off as a "training accident" from the Sagittarius' starboard side.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: ຜົນກະທົບທີ່ທີມງານກຳລັງຊອກຫາອາດຈະເກີດຈາກແຮງດຶງດູດລະຫວ່າງສານມືດຂອງກຸ່ມດາວ ແລະ ຄວາມມືດຂອງທາງຊ້າງເຜືອກ.
mt: The crash is believed to have been caused by the pilot's inattention and the aircraft's stall and loss of control.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: ເຊັ່ນດຽວກັບທີ່ດວງເດືອນອອກແຮງດຶງໜ້າໂລກເຮັດໃຫ້ມີນ້ຳຂຶ້ນນ້ຳລົງ. ສະນັ້ນທາງຊ້າງເຜືອກກໍໃຊ້ແຮງໃນຈັກກະວານ Sagittarius.
mt: As the sun set, the full moon caused the water to rise.  The tides were also high in the Sagittarius constellation.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: ນັກວິທະຍາສາດສາມາດສະຫຼຸບໄດ້ວ່າສະສານມືດຈະສົ່ງຜົນກະທົບຕໍ່ກັບສະສານມືດອື່ນໃນທຳນອງດຽວກັບກັບທີ່ສະສານອື່ນໆເຮັດ.
mt: Scientists say the new drug will have similar side effects to other drugs in the same class.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: ທິດສະດີນີ້ບອກວ່າສິ່ງທີ່ມືດມົນທີ່ສຸດໃນຈັກກະວານແມ່ນຕັ້ງຢູ່ອ້ອມຮອບຈັກກະວານໃນຮູບແບບລັດສະໝີ ແລະ ເຮັດດ້ວຍອະນຸພາກຂະໜາດນ້ອຍຫຼາຍ.
mt: This article is about the smallest object in the solar system, which is located at the edge of the solar system and is the smallest planet.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: ການລາຍງານຂ່າວທາງໂທລະພາບສະແດງໃຫ້ເຫັນຄວັນສີຂາວທີ່ອອກມາຈາກໂຮງງານ.
mt: A television news report shows a fireball coming from the building.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: ເຈົ້າໜ້າທີ່ທ້ອງຖິ່ນ ກຳລັງແຈ້ງເຕືອນປະຊາຊົນທີ່ອາໄສຢູ່ໃນພື້ນທີ່ໃກ້ກັບໂຮງງານໃຫ້ຢູ່ໃນບ້ານ, ປິດເຄື່ອງປັບອາກາດ ແລະ ຫ້າມດື່ມນ້ຳຈາກກັອກ.
mt: The governor of the province where the incident occurred, who lives in the area near the hotel, said the hotel was hit by a power outage and flooded with water from a nearby creek.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: ອີງຕາມຂໍ້ມູນຂອງ ອົງການນິວເຄຼຍຂອງປະເທດຍີ່ປຸ່ນ, ທາດກຳມັນຕະພາບລັງສີ ແຄຊຽມ (radioactive caesium) ແລະ ທາດໄອໂອດິນ ໄດ້ຖືກພົບເຫັນຢູ່ໃນໂຮງງານ.
mt: According to the Japanese Nuclear and Industrial Safety Agency, radioactive caesium and iodine were detected at a hotel.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: ເຈົ້າໜ້າທີ່ຄາດຄະເນວ່າສິ່ງນີ້ບົ່ງບອກວ່າຕູ້ບັນຈຸນ້ຳມັນເຊື້ອໄຟຢູເຣນຽມຢູ່ສະຖານທີ່ດັ່ງກ່າວອາດຈະແຕກ ແລະ ຮົ່ວໄຫຼ່ໄດ້.
mt: The governor said the item was a bomb that could explode and kill people.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: ທ່ານ Tony Moll ໄດ້ຄົ້ນພົບວັນນະໂລກຊະນິດທີ່ຕ້ານຢາຢ່າງຮຸນແຮງ (XDR-TB) ໃນພາກພື້ນອາຟຣິກາໃຕ້ເຂດ KwaZulu-Natal.
mt: Dr Tony Moll has visited the KwaZulu-Natal region to see the impact of the XDR-TB epidemic.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: ໃນການໃຫ້ສຳພາດ, ລາວໄດ້ກ່າວວ່າການປ່ຽນແປງໃໝ່ແມ່ນ “ຄວາມໜັກໃຈ ແລະ ຄວາມຢ້ານຍ້ອນວ່າອັດຕາການຕາຍສູງ.”
mt: In a statement, Laos said the change was “a matter of urgency and importance.”
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: ດຣ. Moll ຄິດວ່າ ຄົນເຈັບບາງຄົນອາດຈະຕິດເຊື້ອພະຍາດໃນໂຮງໝໍ ແລະ ຢ່າງໜ້ອຍສອງຄົນແມ່ນພະນັກງານແພດໃນໂຮງໝໍ.
mt: Dr. Moll said that some people may have been injured in the building and that six people were journalists in the building.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
